This holiday season take a moment to think of the postal workers who are working incredibly hard.

Trump wants to privatize the Postal Service and threaten 630,000+ jobs.

I believe we should strengthen USPS, protect jobs and allow post offices to provide basic banking services.

From South Carolina to Iowa, I’ve been blessed to meet with so many incredible small business owners. They are who makes our economy thrive. On #SmallBusinessSaturday and throughout the holidays, let’s shop local and support those who support our community.

Happy #SmallBusinessSaturday! I've got a plan to use $7 billion in funding grants to help entrepreneurs of color get their small businesses off the ground—and fully close the startup capital gap. https://elizabethwarren.com/plans/leveling-field-entrepreneurs-color?source=soc-WB-ew-tw

I stand in solidarity with Amazon warehouse workers demanding to be treated like human beings. They are sick and tired of the brutal working conditions, injuries, surveillance, and workplace deaths—all to fatten the pockets of a billion-dollar corporation. https://www.vox.com/the-goods/2019/11/27/20985691/amazon-workers-black-friday-2019

On just about every issue we care about—from criminal justice to immigration, affordable housing, climate change, health care, and gun violence—money and influence are holding up widely popular policies.

If we want to make any progress, we must root out corruption in Washington.
Billionaires should not be able to buy elections.
Every American deserves the right to drink clean water and breathe clean air.

It takes incredible courage to speak up against your employer, especially when they are the 2nd wealthiest man in the world.

Sahro, William and Tyler – this movement stands with you.

When WE are in the White House we will restore power to the working class of this country. https://twitter.com/BernieSanders/status/1200529926308474880 QT @BernieSanders Amazon is one of the largest corporations in the world, but it paid $0 in federal income taxes.

It's owned by Jeff Bezos, the second-richest person on Earth.

It is not too much to demand it guarantees safe and decent working conditions for every worker.

People ask how I believe we can come together to address our common pain—well, I know we can because we have before. #OTD in 1993 we passed the bipartisan Brady Bill mandating background checks & waiting period on handgun buyers. It’s saved countless lives. We can do it again.

For too long, huge corporate monopolies have rigged our economy.

Their goal: maximize profits at the expense of small businesses and working Americans.

Under a Sanders administration, we'll take on their greed and allow small businesses to thrive. #SmallBusinessSaturday

Small businesses are the backbone of our country’s economy, with over 4 million in California alone. Take some time today to #ShopSmall and remember the critical role small businesses play in helping our communities thrive.

This is about the future of this planet and the lives of our kids and grandkids.

The American people will not accept a middle ground approach.

Nearly half our college students are going hungry. The top 25 hedge-fund managers on average get $850 million a year—each.

Wall Street’s greed wrecked the hopes and futures of an entire generation. So we will tax Wall Street to cancel all student debt and offer college for all.

Shirley Chisholm was born on this day in 1924. As the first Black woman elected to Congress, she demonstrated the guts, grit, and grace every leader should have.

I was proud to introduce a bill to honor Shirley Chisholm’s legacy by placing a statue of her in the U.S. Capitol.
